/usr/bin/c++      CMakeFiles/app.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/app.dir/myopencv.cpp.o  -o app  -L/home/zzp/miniopencv/lib -lopencv_calib3d -lopencv_core -lopencv_dnn -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_flann -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgcodecs -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_ml -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_photo -lopencv_stitching -lopencv_video -lopencv_videoio -Wl,-rpath,/home/zzp/miniopencv/lib
